attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: List of TemporaryFiles.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Path to the servlet who handles the plupload component.
attribute.name: servletPath

attribute.description: List of prefered runtimes separated by comma.
attribute.name: runtimePreferences

attribute.description: Whether to auto start uploading right after file selection.
attribute.name: autoStart

attribute.description: Enable ability to select multiple files at once in file dialog.
attribute.name: multiSelection

attribute.description: Re-activate the widget after each upload procedure.
attribute.name: multipleQueues

attribute.description: Do not let duplicates into the queue. Dispatches 'plupload.FILE_DUPLICATE_ERROR'.
attribute.name: preventDuplicates

attribute.description: Maximum size per file. Client and server side validation.
attribute.name: maxFileSize

attribute.description: Allowed file extensions separated by comma. Only server-side validation.
attribute.name: allowedTypes

attribute.description: Width for the image resizing. Image won't be resized if width and height are not specified.
attribute.name: resizingWidth

attribute.description: Height for the image resizing. Image won't be resized if width and height are not specified.
attribute.name: resizingHeight

attribute.description: Quality for the image resizing. Image is not necessary resized, if only quality is set, only quality will be changed.
attribute.name: resizingQuality

attribute.description: Your browser doesn't have Flash, Silverlight, HTML4 or HTML5 support. List of prefered support separated by comma.
attribute.name: loadErrorMsg

attribute.description: Language used in the component. Examples: pt for portuguese, fr for french, es for spanish.
attribute.name: language

attribute.description: Id button Submit append upload component. Handle the case when form was submitted before uploading has finished
attribute.name: buttonSubmit

attribute.description: Id button Cancel append upload component. Handle the case when form was canceled and clear files temps
attribute.name: buttonCancel

attribute.description: Show or hidde Add File button. Default: true
attribute.name: showButtonAdd

attribute.description: Show or hidde Start button. Default: true
attribute.name: showButtonStart

attribute.description: Show or hidde Stop button. Default: true
attribute.name: showButtonStop

attribute.description: Show or hidde Global ProgressBar. Default: true
attribute.name: showGlobalProgressBar
